mapper.select:
select
from WZZ_WIFI_SHOP_DISCOUNT t1,WZZ_USER_DISCOUNT t2 where t1.ID=t2.DISC_ID and t2.USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select t1.ID, t1.SHOP_ID, t1.TITLE, t1.REMARK, t1.PHONE, t1.START, t1.END from WZZ_WIFI_SHOP_DISCOUNT t1,WZZ_USER_DISCOUNT t2, WZZ_USER t3 where t1.ID=t2.DISC_ID and t2.USER_ID = t3.ID and t3.USER_NAME=#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update:
update WZZ_WIFI_SHOP_DISCOUNT
SHOP_ID = #{shopId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
START = #{start,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END = #{end,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
